Class ManagerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.UserController
      • controllers.ManagerController

  • public class ManagerController
extends UserController
    Class used to form a link between the user interface and the Manager class.

      • changeStrategyToFIFO

        public boolean changeStrategyToFIFO()
        Tries to change the current strategy to the FIFO strategy. Returns true if successful, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        True if the strategy has been changed successful. False otherwise.

      • changeStrategyToBatchProcessing

        public void changeStrategyToBatchProcessing(int index)
        Tries to change the current strategy to the batch processing strategy. Returns true if successful, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the order for batch processing.
